transcript:
Customer: Gurgauram karunavtaram sansar sar
Hellow
Executive: Awaz aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Haan aa raha hai.
Executive: Ji ji to wahi janna chah raha tha sir ki matlab aapne no diya tha to koi problem aa rahi ho aapko to main aapko problem aa rahi hai aapko lead ki aa rahi hai ki aapke aas pass ki lead aapko mil nahi pa rahi hai kya?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Abhi dekhiye sir aap agar apne panel pe ho ya aap mobile use karte ho sir India Mart mobile se to mere samne abhi ek 20000 piece ki ek fly ash brick ki Raipur Chhattisgarh se ek inquiry aayi hui hai sir. Ye takriban 2 lakh ki order quantity ka order hai. Isko aap confirm kar sakte hain kya abhi?
Customer: Hum log waha nahi chodenge lene aayenge to de denge.
Executive: Haan wo buyer apna delivery ka to baat karni padegi sir dekhiye agar rate agar aap sahi doge sir to buyer aas pass ka buyer hai sir wo usko agar wo rate uske area me nahi milega to wo definitely aapke area se le lega sir maan lo.
Customer: Theek hai na.
Executive: To aap ek bar confirm karke inse baat to kijiye sir ki kya buyer kya kehna chah rahe hain ye khud aayenge ki aapko bhijwana padega. Price wagera aap inko bataiye ek bar.
Customer: Theek hai na.
Executive: Ji aur aap use kaun karta hai aap hi karte hain isko ki koi aur karta hai?
Customer: Mera wo ladka hai na wo karta hai.
Executive: Achcha aap nahi karte hain isko use?
Customer: Haan haan nahi karta hun.
Executive: Achcha to ye jo whatsapp pe message negative mark kiya hai wo aapne kiya hai ki aapke ladke ne kiya hai sir?
Customer: Pata nahi hai sir.
Executive: Whatsapp pe message aapne reply kiya hai na sir abhi feedback ka?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aap apne ladke ka number de sakte hain sir?
Customer: Wo abhi school chala gaya.
Executive: Achcha school chala gaya hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aur kab tak school se aate hain sir ye aapke ladke?
Customer: Shaam ko.
Executive: Shaam ko matlab abhi 1 baj raha hai to main kis time mobile pe call karu to baat ho payegi aapke ladke se?
Customer: 5 baje.
Executive: 5 baje ke baad karu. Baki India Mart aap use nahi karte hain kya sir khud se?
Customer: Karte hain hum log.
Executive: Achcha to agar karte hain to main kuch bata du aapko sir ki kahan se aap number nikal sakte hain jo buyer 20000 piece ki requirement dala hua hai Raipur Chhattisgarh se?
Customer: Wahi 5 baje call karna us time bata dena.
Executive: Chaliye main 5 baje hi kar leta hun aapko baki sir aapne jo matlab feedback provide kiya tha to usko main ek bar confirm yahan se close kar raha hun to aapke pass ek mail me feedback jayega sir aap us pe satisfied mark kar dijiyega sir mail pe.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai main 5 baje connect karta hun aur guide karta hun.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting leads from his area.

- Wants to know who marked negative feedback on WhatsApp.



Resolution:

- Executive provided a lead from Raipur, Chhattisgarh.

- Executive will call back at 5 PM to guide.

- Executive is closing the feedback form.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at 5 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, feedback, follow up
